author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: بِأَمْرِكَ تُبَدَّلُ الذِّلَّةُ بِالعِزَّةِ وَالضَّعْفُ بِالقُوَّةِ وَالعَجْزُ بِالاقْتِدارِ وَالاضْطِرابُ بِالاطْمِئْنانِ وَالرَّيْبُ بِالإِيْقانِ، لا إِلهَ إِلاَّ
translation: Thou art He Who changeth through His bidding abasement into glory, and weakness into strength, and powerlessness into might, and fear into calm, and doubt into certainty. No God is there but Thee, the Mighty, the Beneficent.
